page.title: 12HOTHFIELD (2)
page.content:
The rest of the square not taken up by housing contains a part of{Hothfield {Common,}open farmland with the largest farm called Ripple Court which deals mainly in sheep rearing.
The square is very well served by roads.There is a popular stopping place for goods vehicle drivers who use the mobile cafe and toilets at the roadside on the A20 Trunk Road.
On week-days some seven buses a day run through the area with three on a Sunday. Road communications are therefore quite good to Ashford or for further afield to Maidstone.
It is quite likely that the character of the local road system will change radically when the{M20 Motor-way} opens.
